com.basistech.rosette.api

Class RosetteAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.basistech.rosette.api.RosetteAPI

  • public final class RosetteAPI
extends Object
    You can use the RosetteAPI to access Rosette API endpoints. RosetteAPI is thread-safe and immutable.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RosetteAPI.MorphologicalFeature
      Specify which feature you want Rosette API Morphology endpoint to return.

      Constructor and Description
      RosetteAPI(String key)
      Constructs a Rosette API instance using an API key.
      RosetteAPI(String key, String alternateUrl)
      Constructs a Rosette API instance using an API key and accepts an alternate URL for testing purposes.

                                                                     throws RosetteAPIException,
                                                                            IOException

        Parameters:
        request - NameTranslationRequest contains the name to be translated and the target language.
        Returns:
        NameTranslationResponse
        Throws:
        RosetteAPIException - - If there is a problem with the Rosette API request.
        IOException - - If there is a communication or JSON serialization/deserialization error.

      • getLanguage

        public com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.LanguageResponse getLanguage(InputStream inputStream,
                                                                   com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.LanguageOptions options)
                                                            throws RosetteAPIException,
                                                                   IOException
        Performs language identification on data read from an InputStream. Return a list of languages.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - Input stream of file.
        options - Options to Language API.
        Returns:
        An ordered list of detected languages, including language and detection confidence, sorted by descending confidence.
        Throws:
        RosetteAPIException - - If there is a problem with the Rosette API request.
        IOException - - If there is a communication or JSON serialization/deserialization error.

      • getLanguage

        public com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.LanguageResponse getLanguage(URL url,
                                                                   com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.LanguageOptions options)
                                                            throws RosetteAPIException,
                                                                   IOException
        Performs language identification on data read from an URL. Return a list of languages.
        Parameters:
        url - URL for language detection.
        options - Options to Language API.
        Returns:
        An ordered list of detected languages, including language and detection confidence, sorted by descending confidence.
        Throws:
        RosetteAPIException - - If there is a problem with the Rosette API request.
        IOException - - If there is a communication or JSON serialization/deserialization error.

      • getLanguage

        public com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.LanguageResponse getLanguage(String content,
                                                                   com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.LanguageOptions options)
                                                            throws RosetteAPIException,
                                                                   IOException
        Performs language identification on data read from a string. Return a list of languages.
        Parameters:
        content - String content for language detection.
        options - Options to Language API.
        Returns:
        An ordered list of detected languages, including language and detection confidence, sorted by descending confidence.
        Throws:
        RosetteAPIException - - If there is a problem with the Rosette API request.
        IOException - - If there is a communication or JSON serialization/deserialization error.

      • getLanguage

        public com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.LanguageResponse getLanguage(String content,
                                                                   com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.InputUnit unit,
                                                                   com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.LanguageOptions options)
                                                            throws RosetteAPIException,
                                                                   IOException
        Returns a list of candidate languages in order of descending confidence from a string.
        Parameters:
        content - String content for language detection.
        unit - The unit of content. Can be SENTENCE or DOC. If SENTENCE, the entire content is treated as one sentence.
        options - Options to Language API.
        Returns:
        An ordered list of detected languages, including language and detection confidence, sorted by descending confidence.
        Throws:
        RosetteAPIException - - If there is a problem with the Rosette API request.
        IOException - - If there is a communication or JSON serialization/deserialization error.

      • getMorphology

        public com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.MorphologyResponse getMorphology(RosetteAPI.MorphologicalFeature morphologicalFeature,
                                                                       InputStream inputStream,
                                                                       com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.LanguageCode language,
                                                                       com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.MorphologyOptions options)
                                                                throws RosetteAPIException,
                                                                       IOException
        Returns morphological analysis of the input file. The response may include lemmas, part of speech tags, compound word components, and Han readings. Support for specific return types depends on language.
        Parameters:
        morphologicalFeature - Type of morphological analysis to perform.
        inputStream - Input stream of file.
        language - Language of input if known (see LanguageCode), or null
        options - Linguistics options
        Returns:
        MorphologyResponse
        Throws:
        RosetteAPIException - - If there is a problem with the Rosette API request.
        IOException - - If there is a communication or JSON serialization/deserialization error.

      • getMorphology

        public com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.MorphologyResponse getMorphology(RosetteAPI.MorphologicalFeature morphologicalFeature,
                                                                       URL url,
                                                                       com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.LanguageCode language,
                                                                       com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.MorphologyOptions options)
                                                                throws RosetteAPIException,
                                                                       IOException
        Returns morphological analysis of the URL content. The response may include lemmas, part of speech tags, compound word components, and Han readings. Support for specific return types depends on language.
        Parameters:
        morphologicalFeature - Type of morphological analysis to perform.
        url - URL containing the data.
        language - Language of input if known (see LanguageCode), or null
        options - Linguistics options
        Returns:
        MorphologyResponse
        Throws:
        RosetteAPIException - - If there is a problem with the Rosette API request.
        IOException - - If there is a communication or JSON serialization/deserialization error.

      • getMorphology

        public com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.MorphologyResponse getMorphology(RosetteAPI.MorphologicalFeature morphologicalFeature,
                                                                       String content,
                                                                       com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.LanguageCode language,
                                                                       com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.InputUnit unit,
                                                                       com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.MorphologyOptions options)
                                                                throws RosetteAPIException,
                                                                       IOException
        Returns morphological analysis of a string. The response may include lemmas, part of speech tags, compound word components, and Han readings. Support for specific return types depends on language.
        Parameters:
        morphologicalFeature - Type of morphological analysis to perform.
        content - String containing the data.
        language - Language of input if known (see LanguageCode), or null.
        unit - The unit of content (see InputUnit). Can be SENTENCE or DOC. If SENTENCE, the entire content is treated as one sentence.
        options - Linguistics options
        Returns:
        MorphologyResponse
        Throws:
        RosetteAPIException - - If there is a problem with the Rosette API request.
        IOException - - If there is a communication or JSON serialization/deserialization error.

      • getEntities

        public com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.EntitiesResponse getEntities(InputStream inputStream,
                                                                   com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.LanguageCode language,
                                                                   com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.EntitiesOptions options)
                                                            throws RosetteAPIException,
                                                                   IOException
        Returns entities extracted from the input file. The response is a list of extracted entities. Each entity includes chain ID (all instances of the same entity share a chain id), mention (entity text in the input), normalized text (the most complete form of this entity that appears in the input), count (how many times this entity appears in the input), and the confidence associated with the extraction.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - Input stream of file.
        language - Language of input if known (see LanguageCode), or null.
        options - Entity options.
        Returns:
        EntitiesResponse
        Throws:
        RosetteAPIException - - If there is a problem with the Rosette API request.
        IOException - - If there is a communication or JSON serialization/deserialization error.

      • getEntities

        public com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.EntitiesResponse getEntities(URL url,
                                                                   com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.LanguageCode language,
                                                                   com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.EntitiesOptions options)
                                                            throws RosetteAPIException,
                                                                   IOException
        Returns entities extracted from the URL content. The response is a list of extracted entities. Each entity includes chain ID (all instances of the same entity share a chain id), mention (entity text in the input), normalized text (the most complete form of this entity that appears in the input), count (how many times this entity appears in the input), and the confidence associated with the extraction.
        Parameters:
        url - URL containing the data.
        language - Language of input if known (see LanguageCode), or null.
        options - Entity options.
        Returns:
        EntitiesResponse
        Throws:
        RosetteAPIException - - If there is a problem with the Rosette API request.
        IOException - - If there is a communication or JSON serialization/deserialization error.

      • getEntities

        public com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.EntitiesResponse getEntities(String content,
                                                                   com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.LanguageCode language,
                                                                   com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.EntitiesOptions options)
                                                            throws RosetteAPIException,
                                                                   IOException
        Returns entities extracted from a string. The response is a list of extracted entities. Each entity includes chain ID (all instances of the same entity share a chain id), mention (entity text in the input), normalized text (the most complete form of this entity that appears in the input), count (how many times this entity appears in the input), and the confidence associated with the extraction.
        Parameters:
        content - String containing the data.
        language - Language of input if known (see LanguageCode), or null.
        options - Entity options.
        Returns:
        EntitiesResponse
        Throws:
        RosetteAPIException - - If there is a problem with the Rosette API request.
        IOException - - If there is a communication or JSON serialization/deserialization error.

      • getEntities

        public com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.EntitiesResponse getEntities(String content,
                                                                   com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.LanguageCode language,
                                                                   com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.InputUnit unit,
                                                                   com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.EntitiesOptions options)
                                                            throws RosetteAPIException,
                                                                   IOException
        Returns entities extracted from a string. The response is a list of extracted entities. Each entity includes chain ID (all instances of the same entity share a chain id), mention (entity text in the input), normalized text (the most complete form of this entity that appears in the input), count (how many times this entity appears in the input), and the confidence associated with the extraction.
        Parameters:
        content - String containing the data.
        language - Language of input if known (see LanguageCode), or null.
        unit - The unit of content (see InputUnit). Can be SENTENCE or DOC. If SENTENCE, the entire content is treated as one sentence.
        options - Entity options.
        Returns:
        EntitiesResponse
        Throws:
        RosetteAPIException - - If there is a problem with the Rosette API request.
        IOException - - If there is a communication or JSON serialization/deserialization error.

      • getLinkedEntities

        public com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.LinkedEntitiesResponse getLinkedEntities(InputStream inputStream,
                                                                               com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.LanguageCode language)
                                                                        throws RosetteAPIException,
                                                                               IOException
        Links entities in the input file to entities in the knowledge base (Wikidata). The response identifies the entities in the input that have been linked to entities in the knowledge base. Each entity includes an entity id (from the knowledge base), a chain id (all instances of the same entity share a chain id), the mention (entity text from the input), and confidence associated with the linking.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - Input stream of file.
        language - Language of input if known (see LanguageCode), or null.
        Returns:
        LinkedEntityResponse
        Throws:
        RosetteAPIException - - If there is a problem with the Rosette API request.
        IOException - - If there is a communication or JSON serialization/deserialization error.

      • getLinkedEntities

        public com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.LinkedEntitiesResponse getLinkedEntities(URL url,
                                                                               com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.LanguageCode language)
                                                                        throws RosetteAPIException,
                                                                               IOException
        Links entities in the URL content to entities in the knowledge base (Wikidata). The response identifies the entities in the input that have been linked to entities in the knowledge base. Each entity includes an entity id (from the knowledge base), a chain id (all instances of the same entity share a chain id), the mention (entity text from the input), and confidence associated with the linking.
        Parameters:
        url - URL containing the data.
        language - Language of input if known (see LanguageCode), or null.
        Returns:
        LinkedEntityResponse
        Throws:
        RosetteAPIException - - If there is a problem with the Rosette API request.
        IOException - - If there is a communication or JSON serialization/deserialization error.

      • getLinkedEntities

      • getCategories

        public com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.CategoriesResponse getCategories(InputStream inputStream,
                                                                       com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.LanguageCode language,
                                                                       com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.CategoriesOptions options)
                                                                throws RosetteAPIException,
                                                                       IOException
        Returns an ordered list of categories identified in the input file. The categories are Tier 1 contextual categories defined in the QAG Taxonomy. The response is the contextual categories identified in the input.

        Returns:
        CategoriesResponse
        Throws:
        RosetteAPIException - - If there is a problem with the Rosette API request.

      • getRelationships

        public com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.RelationshipsResponse getRelationships(String content,
                                                                             com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.LanguageCode language,
                                                                             com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.InputUnit unit,
                                                                             com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.RelationshipOptions options)
                                                                      throws RosetteAPIException,
                                                                             IOException
        Returns each relationship extracted from the input. The response is a list of extracted relationships. A relationship contains predicate - usually the main verb, property or action that is expressed by the text arg1 - usually the subject, agent or main actor of the relationship arg2 [optional] - complements the predicate and is usually the object, theme or patient of the relationship arg3 [optional] - usually an additional object in ditransitive verbs adjuncts [optional] - contain all optional parts of a relationship which are not temporal or locative expressions locatives [optional] - usually express the locations the action expressed by the relationship took place temporals [ optional] - usually express the time in which the action expressed by the relationship took place confidence - a measure of quality of relationship extraction, between 0 - 1
        Parameters:
        content, - String containing the data.
        language - Language of input if known (see LanguageCode), or null.
        unit - The unit of content (see InputUnit). Can be SENTENCE or DOC. If SENTENCE, the entire content is treated as one sentence.
        options - RelationshipOptions
        Returns:
        RelationshipsResponse
        Throws:
        RosetteAPIException - - If there is a problem with the Rosette API request
        IOException - - If there is a commuincation or JSON serialization/deserialization error

      • getRelationships

                                                                             com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.LanguageCode language,
                                                                             com.basistech.rosette.apimodel.RelationshipOptions options)
                                                                      throws RosetteAPIException,
                                                                             IOException
        Returns each relationship extracted from the input. The response is a list of extracted relationships. A relationship contains predicate - usually the main verb, property or action that is expressed by the text arg1 - usually the subject, agent or main actor of the relationship arg2 [optional] - complements the predicate and is usually the object, theme or patient of the relationship arg3 [optional] - usually an additional object in ditransitive verbs adjuncts [optional] - contain all optional parts of a relationship which are not temporal or locative expressions locatives [optional] - usually express the locations the action expressed by the relationship took place temporals [ optional] - usually express the time in which the action expressed by the relationship took place confidence - a measure of quality of relationship extraction, between 0 - 1
        Parameters:
        content, - String containing the data.
        language - Language of input if known (see LanguageCode), or null.
        options - RelationshipOptions
        Returns:
        RelationshipsResponse
        Throws:
        RosetteAPIException - - If there is a problem with the Rosette API request
        IOException - - If there is a commuincation or JSON serialization/deserialization error
